nodes.text: This baker droid was employed by Senator Padmé Amidala to cater a function in honor of Senator Aang, whom she was trying to sway as the deciding vote on a bill she hoped to pass in the Senate.

The event hinged on the creation of a jogan fruitcake, which was the favorite dessert of the Roonan senator. When R2-D2 and C-3PO were sent to buy the jogan for the cake and had not returned, the droid was worried. However, they finally returned with the fruit. He, with the help of several LEP servant droids, placed the finishing touches on the cake and brought it out to the dining table.

The baker droid is portrayed by celebrity chef Duff Goldman.
Its model seems to be related to the 2-1B surgical droid.
